item.title: Transfers from stocks and shares to cash ISAs to be banned under Autumn Budget reforms
item.description: The government seems to be doing its best to push people away from cash ISAs by banning transfers

item.title: Where to look for Christmas gifts for collectors
item.description: “Buy now” marketplaces are rich hunting grounds when it comes to buying Christmas gifts for collectors, says Chris Carter

item.title: Cash ISA cuts: millions of savers face £1,200 tax bill after five years
item.description: A combination of cuts to the cash ISA allowance and higher income tax on savings will deal a blow to savers as many could face a tax bill

item.title: No peace dividend in Trump's Ukraine plan
item.description: An end to fighting in Ukraine will hurt defence shares in the short term, but the boom is likely to continue given US isolationism, says Matthew Lynn

item.title: Saba strikes again at Edinburgh Worldwide
item.description: The activist investor, Saba, seems to be gearing up for a fresh attempt to displace the board of a UK investment trust.
